question:
State pairs had been formed as a part of Ek Bharat Shreshtha Bharat project. In this context, consider the following statements:
  1. As a part of the project, TN is the sister state of J&K.
  2. It is a project of the human resource development ministry.
Which of the above statements is/are true?
explanation: Statement 1 is correct: The newly formed UT of Jammu and Kashmir has been paired with Tamil Nadu. The two states are to engage with each other to develop better understanding of each other’s culture. The states will also promote tourism and special discounts for tourists from the sister state.  Statement 2 is correct: The Ek Bharat Shreshtha Bharat is a project of the ministry of human resource development. It is the nodal ministry that will coordinate the project. The objectives of the project are to celebrate diversity, promote national integration, establish engagements, showcase the heritage and culture, etc.
